section.title: Service Request Library
section.para: The basic RESTful service methods provide a powerful and granular way of accessing the Reef service API. However, many common requests can be simplified, both conceptually and in terms of code, by being factored into method calls. The Reef service request library provides adapters for ISession that expose idiomatic Java interfaces for Reef services.

The adapters are pure interfaces suitable for use in most application code. Interfaces are defined by function (MeasurementService, EventService, EntityService, ...) but there is also a single "super interface" that provides all functions in all of the service interfaces: AllScadaService.

example.title: Using the Service Request Library

section.para: Users should refer to the Service Request Library documentation for a full listing of interfaces and methods.
